languages.text: "Это невозможно, Дитя Рассвета — ты уже соткал{mf||а} эту судьбу. Этот сосуд теперь и навсегда — одна из тысячи моих зениц". {n}Голова псайберворона с хрустом падает набок, будто что-то невидимое свернуло ему шею. Пару секунд птица смотрит на вас совершенно мертвыми глазами, затем вздрагивает и оживает, поднимая голову.{/n}

"That is impossible, Child of the Dawn — it was you who wove this fate into being. Now and for all time, this vessel is one of thousands of my eye's pupils." {n}The raven's head cracks and falls to one side, as if something invisible had snapped its neck. For a few seconds, the bird stares at you with dead eyes, before suddenly jerking back to life and raising its head once more.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Это невозможно, Дитя Рассвета — ты уже соткал{mf||а} эту судьбу. languages.text: "Das ist unmöglich, Kind der Dämmerung – Ihr habt dieses Schicksal in seine Existenz gewebt. Jetzt und für alle Zeit ist dieses Gefäß eine der tausend Pupillen meines Auges." {n}Der Kopf des Raben knackt und fällt zur Seite, als habe etwas Unsichtbares ihm das Genick gebrochen. Einige Sekunden lang starrt dich der Vogel mit toten Augen an, bevor er plötzlich wieder zum Leben erwacht und seinen Kopf hebt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That is impossible, Child of the Dawn — it was you who wove this fate into being. Now and for all time, this vessel is one of thousands of my eye's pupils." {n}The raven's head cracks and falls to one side, as if something invisible had snapped its neck. For a few seconds, the bird stares at you with dead eyes, before suddenly jerking back to life and raising its head once more.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Das ist unmöglich, Kind der Dämmerung – Ihr habt dieses Schicksal in seine Existenz gewebt. Jetzt und für alle Zeit ist dieses Gefäß eine der tausend Pupillen meines Auges." {n}Der Kopf des Raben knackt und fällt zur Seite, als habe etwas Unsichtbares ihm das Genick gebrochen. Einige Sekunden lang starrt dich der Vogel mit toten Augen an, bevor er plötzlich wieder zum Leben erwacht und seinen Kopf hebt.{/n}

languages.text: « Cela m'est impossible, enfant de l'Aube, car c'est vous-même qui avez tissé ce destin. Cet hôte restera pour toujours l'une des nombreuses pupilles de mon œil. » {n}La tête de la corneille tombe sur le côté dans un craquement, comme si des mains invisibles lui avaient brisé le cou. Pendant quelques secondes, l'oiseau vous fixe de ses yeux morts, puis reprend vie en sursautant et relève la tête.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That is impossible, Child of the Dawn — it was you who wove this fate into being. Now and for all time, this vessel is one of thousands of my eye's pupils." {n}The raven's head cracks and falls to one side, as if something invisible had snapped its neck. For a few seconds, the bird stares at you with dead eyes, before suddenly jerking back to life and raising its head once more.{/n}

Pendant quelques secondes, l'oiseau vous fixe de ses yeux morts, puis reprend vie en sursautant et relève la tête.{/n}

languages.text: “这恐怕不可能，黎明之子。如今的命运是你亲手编织的，这只渡鸦已经成为了我无数瞳孔中的一颗，直至永恒。”{n}渡鸦的脖子发出了“咔嚓”一声，歪向了一侧，仿佛被某种看不见的东西折断了。它毫无生机的双眼盯着你，盯了几秒钟。随后，渡鸦突然恢复了生机，再次抬起了头。{/n}
languages.original_text: "That is impossible, Child of the Dawn — it was you who wove this fate into being. Now and for all time, this vessel is one of thousands of my eye's pupils." {n}The raven's head cracks and falls to one side, as if something invisible had snapped its neck. For a few seconds, the bird stares at you with dead eyes, before suddenly jerking back to life and raising its head once more.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这恐怕不可能，黎明之子。如今的命运是你亲手编织的，这只渡鸦已经成为了我无数瞳孔中的一颗，直至永恒。”{n}渡鸦的脖子发出了“咔嚓”一声，歪向了一侧，仿佛被某种看不见的东西折断了。它毫无生机的双眼盯着你，盯了几秒钟。随后，渡鸦突然恢复了生机，再次抬起了头。{/n}

languages.text: «Eso es imposible, Vástago del Amanecer: fuiste tú quien tejió este destino. Ahora y hasta el fin de los tiempos, este receptáculo es una de las miles pupilas de mi ojo». {n}La cabeza del cuervo cruje y cuelga a un lado, como si algo invisible le hubiera roto el cuello. Durante unos segundos, el pájaro te observa con ojos muertos, antes de volver repentinamente a la vida y alzar de nuevo la cabeza.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That is impossible, Child of the Dawn — it was you who wove this fate into being. Now and for all time, this vessel is one of thousands of my eye's pupils." {n}The raven's head cracks and falls to one side, as if something invisible had snapped its neck. For a few seconds, the bird stares at you with dead eyes, before suddenly jerking back to life and raising its head once more.{/n}

Durante unos segundos, el pájaro te observa con ojos muertos, antes de volver repentinamente a la vida y alzar de nuevo la cabeza.{/n}

languages.text: 「暁の子よ、それは不可能だ。この運命を紡ぎ出したのはお前自身だ。今もこれからも、この器は私の眼の数千の瞳の一つなのだ」{n}レイヴンの頭が不自然に軋みながら片側へと傾いた。まるで目に見えぬ何かが、その首をねじ曲げたかのように。数秒間、鳥は虚ろな瞳であなたを見つめていたが、やがて突然震え上がり、再び頭を持ち上げた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "That is impossible, Child of the Dawn — it was you who wove this fate into being. Now and for all time, this vessel is one of thousands of my eye's pupils." {n}The raven's head cracks and falls to one side, as if something invisible had snapped its neck. For a few seconds, the bird stares at you with dead eyes, before suddenly jerking back to life and raising its head once more.{/n}

languages.text: "Bu imkânsız Şafak Evladı. Bu yazgıyı dokuyan sendin. Şimdi ve daima bu beden, gözümün binlerce bebeğinden yalnızca biri olacak." {n}Kuzgunun başı, görünmez bir el boynunu kırmışçasına yana düşüyor. Birkaç saniye ölü gözlerle sana bakıyor, sonra ansızın silkelenip diriliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That is impossible, Child of the Dawn — it was you who wove this fate into being. Now and for all time, this vessel is one of thousands of my eye's pupils." {n}The raven's head cracks and falls to one side, as if something invisible had snapped its neck. For a few seconds, the bird stares at you with dead eyes, before suddenly jerking back to life and raising its head once more.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bu imkânsız Şafak Evladı. Bu yazgıyı dokuyan sendin. Şimdi ve daima bu beden, gözümün binlerce bebeğinden yalnızca biri olacak." {n}Kuzgunun başı, görünmez bir el boynunu kırmışçasına yana düşer. Birkaç saniye ölü gözlerle sana bakar, sonra ansızın silkelenip dirilir.{/n}
